channel.title: Self-Care on web with mizouzie
channel.description: Recent content in Self-Care on web with mizouzie

item.title: I Tried Working at 30,000ft
item.description: The rare occasion of me traveling alone came up and I was excited to have a few hours alone with my thoughts and make the most of the opportunity to get loads of work done.

item.title: Re-reading my old blogs
item.description: Having finally made a site to house my own work, using old material from a year ago had some unexpected benefits.

item.title: L.I.F.T - the anti-advice that could save you
item.description: It’s not bad advice when I say Leave It For Tomorrow!

item.title: Recognise struggle for what it is
item.description: It is what it is. Learn what you can.

item.title: Starting is one thing, STOPPING is another
item.description: It is vitally important to keep track of yourself when working. Let’s explore a few of the pitfalls.
